servinfo.title: P/S Pump Removal and Installation for M16 Engine Model

attention3.ptxt: Be sure to clean each joint of suction and discharge sides thoroughly before removal.

s1.ptxt: Take out P/S fluid in reservoir with syringe or such.
Disconnect high pressure pipe and suction hose from P/S pump.

attention3.ptxt: As fluid flows out of disconnected joints, put a receptacle under joints or a plug to pipe.

s1.ptxt: Disconnect pressure switch lead wire at switch terminal.
Remove P/S drive belt referring to P/S Pump and A/C Compressor (If Equipped) Drive Belt Removal and Installation for M16 Engine Model .

attention3.ptxt: Plug each port of removed pump to prevent dust or any other foreign matter from entering.

servinfosub.title: Installation
servinfosub.ptxt: Reverse removal procedure, and then noting the following instructions.

item.ptxt: Adjust P/S pump drive belt referring to P/S Pump and A/C Compressor (If Equipped) Drive Belt Inspection and Adjustment for M16 Engine Model .
Fill specified power steering fluid after installation and bleed air without failure. (Refer to P/S System Air Bleeding Procedure .)
